short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool that will help you quickly create fancy CSS shapes easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple yet functional random radius generator. Create random shapes/blobs using the CSS border radius property. 
If not satisfied create your own shapes using the editor (kindof)

Features
-  Quick copy
-  Easy UI
-  Dark Mode
